thread.title: Kite Realty Group Trust Announces Quarterly Common Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Kite Realty Group Trust Announces Quarterly Common Dividend

organizations.name: kite realty group trust kite realty group trust

text:
INDIANAPOLIS, May 10, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kite Realty Group Trust (NYSE:KRG) (the “Company”) announced today that its Board of Trustees declared a quarterly cash distribution of $0.3175 per common share for the quarter ended June 30, 2018. This distribution will be paid on or about July 13, 2018, to shareholders of record as of July 6, 2018.
About Kite Realty Group Trust
Kite Realty Group Trust is a full-service, vertically integrated real estate investment trust (REIT) that provides communities with convenient and beneficial shopping experiences. We connect consumers to tenants in desirable markets through our diverse portfolio of high-quality community, neighborhood, and lifestyle centers. Using operational, development, and redevelopment expertise, we continuously optimize our portfolio to maximize value and return to our shareholders. For more information, please visit our website at kiterealty.com . As of March 31, 2018, the Company owned interests in 115 operating and redevelopment properties totaling approximately 22.5 million square feet and 2 development projects currently under construction totaling 0.7 million square feet.
